attributes.action: Reduce Diesel tax to match as petrol to help stimulate the economy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recognising the Prime Ministers Contribution to helping steady our economy- now would be the time to align Diesel tax with Petrol to reduce the burden on SME sector for whom transport costs of goods, and personnel is a significant factor. In turn for consumers with diesel cars it would allow a small but significant stamp of the government doing something to direct to releave fuel costs

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
